plot: This takes a look at one of the most famous or infamous dark African kingdoms. It re-examines the rule of King Shaka and its relationships with the British and Boers.
title: "Lost Kingdoms of Africa" The Zulu Kingdom
plot_es: This takes a look at one of the most famous or infamous dark African kingdoms. It re-examines the rule of King Shaka and its relationships with the British and Boers.
